column3: Epic Greek-mythology scene: a majestic marble hand lifts a glowing, translucent veil from an ancient krater vase, suspended mid-air above a moonlit Acropolis. Cinematic chiaroscuro lighting: cool moonbeams cut across warm amber torchlight, particles of golden dust swirling. Hyper-realistic style, 8K, 35 mm depth of field, low-angle hero shot, Rule-of-Thirds. Palette: alabaster white, deep Aegean blue, molten gold accents. Mood: reverent, mysterious, moment of revelation. Ultra-sharp textures, subtle volumetric fog, gentle lens flare on polished bronze armor glimpsed in background.

High-octane mythic chase: a winged Nike-like figure in flowing crimson peplos soars above a storm-torn olive grove, pursuing a glowing spectral stag across a charcoal sky split by violet lightning. Dynamic motion blur on leaves, rain streaks frozen mid-bounce. Dramatic rim lighting outlines both figures, electric-blue bolts illuminate marble skin. Cinematic wide-angle, 24 mm lens, slight Dutch tilt for urgency. Palette: obsidian black, blood-red, ionized violet, flashes of white-hot silver. Mood: adrenaline, divine determination. 8K, ultra-real, subtle film grain, shallow DOF on foreground raindrops.
